main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Lynchburg, Virginia on May 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as oval in shape and moving at a speed too fast for a balloon., The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute., The observer reported a buzzing sound associated with the sighting., The object appeared silver and was estimated to be 40-50 feet in diameter., Despite an attempt for interception, there were negative results from the investigation.
